articles.author: Rohan Mattu, Amy Kawata
articles.title: Suspect Jason Billingsley arrested in murder of Baltimore tech CEO Pava LaPere - CBS Baltimore
articles.description: Police said Billingsley, 32, eluded capture multiple times on a warrant for a West Baltimore arson last week.
articles.content:
BALTIMORE -- Jason Billingsley, the man suspected in the murder of 26-year-old tech CEO Pava LaPere and an arson and rape last week, was arrested Wednesday night, Baltimore police said. 
Billingsley… [+5605 chars]
